text:
@RepAndyBiggsAZ So, Andy 👆@RepAndyBiggsAZ 👆

as someone who dearly loves to brag about going on #foxnews,

How much responsibility are you taking 

for THIS--and all the ppl he likely got killed by #COVID19 along the way🧐🧐

https://t.co/kgU7qcqUz3
